summary: This is an automatic email reply from a prosecutor involved in United States v. Epstein, indicating they are on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact information for urgent matters related to the case. It shows ongoing legal proceedings in August 2019.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: Mentioned as the judge before whom the email author is currently on trial.

events.title: Automatic Reply Regarding Epstein Case
events.description: An automatic email reply is sent from a prosecutor involved in United States v. Epstein, indicating they are on trial and providing contact information for urgent case matters.

keyFacts: The document is an automatic email reply dated August 27, 2019, from a prosecutor involved in United States v. Epstein.
The prosecutor indicates they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams.
Contact information for an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) is provided for immediate assistance regarding the Epstein case (19 Cr. 490 (RMB)).
